explains: n. 指挥官，长官；海军中校；英国高级警官；高级骑士（或爵士）
wordGroup: commander in chief 统帅，总司令
deputy commander 副司令；副指挥
supreme commander 最高指挥官；最高统帅；最高司令官
wing commander n. （英）皇家空军中校

sentences.en: The commander had been forewarned of the attack.
sentences.cn: 指挥官预先得到敌人要发动袭击的警告。

sentences.en: The commander and some of the men had been released.
sentences.cn: 指挥官和一些士兵已被释放。

sentences.en: The commander said that the army would comply with the ceasefire.
sentences.cn: 指挥官说过部队会遵从停火协议。
